title: Kendall Jenner throws support behind Miley Cyrus
text:
Kendall Jenner stans Miley Cyrus and her slut-shaming rant (Picture: Backgrid/WireImage)

Kendall Jenner stans Miley Cyrus and she wants her to know it.

The 23-year-old threw her support behind pal Miley, after news surfaced of the Wrecking Ball singer’s seemingly new romance with Australian star Cody Simpson.

Miley is currently going through a divorce, after splitting with husband Liam Hemsworth, and she only just announced her split from ex-girlfriend Kaitlynn Carter.

But, proving she moves on quickly, Miley has since been seen kissing Cody and it’s caused all kinds of a stir across the internet.

So much so, that Miley was forced to defend her love life, while taking a stance against slut-shamers.

And Kendall, well she’s got Miley’s back.

Miley had posted a lengthy statement online, after sharing footage of herself kissing Cody and declaring he is her ‘type’, where she vented her frustration over dating in the public eye.

Advertisement

Advertisement

It read: ‘I know the public feels invested in my past relationship because they felt like they saw it thru from the beginning. I think that’s why people have always felt so entitled over my life and how I live it because they’ve watched me grow up.’

The singer also addressed the double standards in the entertainment industry towards women and men dating, stating her male counterparts rarely get ‘slut-shamed’ for their actions, while women are slated for moving on from a relationship quickly.

Kendall could relate and tweeted Miley in response to say: ‘I feel this! Live your life girl.’

Miley was seen kissing Cody Simpson just weeks after Kaitlynn Carter split (Picture: Miley Cyrus)

Late last month, it was revealed Miley had split from Brody Jenner’s ex Kaitlynn after just over a month of dating.

The girls had shocked with their surprise romance, as they were seen kissing on holiday at the same time Miley confirmed she and Liam were separating.

She hit back at claims the two relationships had overlapped and while she had seemed pretty smitten with Kaitlynn, sources told People the girls had chosen to end their romance, but are still good friends.

description: Miley Cyrus was forced to defend herself after being seen kissing Australian star Cody Simpson.
